::: Jackle began to put together a sniper riffle he had brought. It was five 
peices in all. After snapping them together he aimed it ever so carefully at 
the head of Rhinox. Being over 100 meters away he needed the scope. He aimed, 
and fired. :::

::: Transanulas sent a batch of cluster missle towrds the auto-gun Rhinox was 
fixing, while Black Aracnia used her spider arms as machine guns and took out 
another auto-gun. Gremlin, Jackle, Marine, Inferno, and Rampage all began to 
shoot the hull, waiting until they breeched it and could enter. Hell Beast, 
with a chain gun, fired at Rhinox and waited for the other Maximals to come 
out. ::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron slammed down his transmetal foot. ::: Ah, thats it! Waspinator, 
come! Darkmouse, stay here, your incharge until my return. When Scorpinox and 
Quickstrike return tel lthem I went to the MAximal base.

::: Waspinator ::: What are we going to be doing?

::: Megatron ::: While Hell Beast and Shuko are outside, we will break inside 
and begin to take the supplies we need...and cause as much werkless havoc as 
possible!

::: Waspinator ::: Ok, and waht about firebird?

::: Ra was sitting, polishing a pistol :::

::: Megatron ::: I dont think we would be very welcomed at the battle if we 
brought him along. 

::: With that, the two Predacons transformed into beast mode and took to the 
sky heading for the fight. :::
